lines.text: create vector of integers called letter with size 26
for i = 0 to length of s exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < s . length ( ) ; i ++ )

lines.text: assign value s [ i ] to the character c
for integer j = 0 to size of letter [ i ] exclusive

lines.text: set integer index1 to letter [ i ] [ j ]
set integer index2 to letter [ i ] [ k ]
while index1 and index2 are less than length of s
lines.code: while ( index1 < s . length ( ) && index2 < s . length ( ) )

lines.text: if tmp_ans is greater than ans
print ans and a new line
